about_the_game:
"A snowy VR counterpart to Firewatch" - 4players.de

In this exploration adventure on skis you take a well-deserved time out. After everything that happened recently, you figure you really need to take a break and get away from it all. You sign up for a volunteer job with the Snow Scouts, a non-profit organisation that runs some ski resorts high in the mountains. You will be responsible for fixing up an entire valley all by yourself, only being guided by your supervisor via radio. You'll try out and open all the different ski slopes, test the snow cover for any avalanche risk, and if need be, set off a calculated avalanche to ensure safety for others. You'll even come across some rare alpine birds, get a chance to open new paths and get to know your supervisor - and maybe even yourself - a little better through radio conversations. Up here in this pristine mountain environment, with you all alone in nature, nothing can go wrong. Or can it?




FEATURES:

  • Move through a remote alpine valley using an immersive skiing simulation in virtual reality
  • Descent-style skiing as well as cross-country skiing
  • Play in sportsy standing mode and burn up to 400 calories an hour (according to YUR.fit Steam integration) or try the new, relaxed seated mode
  • Complete adventure and job-simulator like tasks based on real-life ski patrols
  • Ride 21 different ski slopes and compete in their online leaderboards
  • Build a relationship with your handler, whom you communicate with via radio
  • Engage in several kinds of optional side tasks
  • Relax in your ski hut after a hard day of work
  • Collect a variety of different Steam achievements
  • Over 2 hours of recorded dialogue, with more to come
  • Contains an unreleased 50-minute documentary about the Serengeti in Africa

name: Snow Scout

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 / Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or OpenXR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070 / RX Vega 56
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

usk.descriptors: Approved for children aged 6 (six) and above in accordance with Art. 14 JuSchG

reviews:
“Ultimately Snow Scout is a low pressure skiing simulator with job simulator like aspects and if that sounds like something you’d enjoy then it’s definitely worth grabbing a copy… with the added bonus that you could well get a bit of a work out after all the skiing you will get up to.”
8/10 – ImpulseGamer

“It is hard to sell how well the game has been made, and you really need to play it to understand its charm”
7.6/10 – The VR Realm

“(VERY GOOD) Fun, relaxing vacation getaway”
7.8/10 – Without Parole
short_description: In this exploration adventure on skis, which is experienced in virtual reality, you start a one-week stint as a volunteer for the Snow Scouts. Fixing up a remote ski resort, all alone high in the mountains, nothing can go wrong - right?
supported_languages:
English*, German*, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Finnish
*languages with full audio support
